contentList.content: some book about devils or something idk

[The first pages of the book are filled with descriptions of the weird nature a party of wizards has encountered while exploring Avernus]
[The formal text ends abruptly and is followed by an incoherent rant]

I told them not to touch the damn water! Stupid, stupid, stupid idiots! "Oh but I know better than you, I did better in wizard college" -- idiots! I told them we must go home! I told them not to drink the water!! But now Doderick doesn't even remember the spell to open the damn portal anymore.... we're all going to die here... we're all going to die..

I'm going to get myself some of that "water" and hope I forget how to breathe before those... Creatures... find me...
